description: to monitor pod cpu, memory, I/O, RX/TX and cluster cpu, memory request/limit/real usage, RX/TX, Disk I/O

panels.description:
This statement is used to calculate the memory usage (as a percentage) for each Pod, i.e., the ratio of actual memory used to the set memory limit .

May require attention when usage exceeds 80 per cent.

Alerts may be required when usage exceeds 90 per cent.

May be at risk of OOM when usage continues to approach 100%
panels.title: memory usage/ usage limit of Pod(%)

title: Kubernetes Dashboard By Chever
